long_description: Solid, rugged and sophisticated, the Merrell Range Duffel offers proven functionality and a classic design for travels near and far. Made from polyester with durable, water-resistant tarpaulin bottom fabric; leather trim and aluminum hardware add polished style. Features rugged haul handles and safety-belt quality webbing throughout; adjustable shoulder strap detaches and conveniently stows away. Oversize main compartment includes a zipper closure; secure any load with the 4-point compression strap system. Large, zippered exterior cargo pocket; zippered mesh organizer pocket; 3 stash pockets with a bound finish. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline). Closeout.
short_description: Solid, rugged and sophisticated, the Merrell Range Duffel offers proven functionality and a classic design for travels near and far.
